messages.title: Making a success of Brexit
messages.content: Theresa May's plan for Britain means she has the strength and stability to get the best deal for Britain.

messages.title: Stronger Economy
messages.content: Every vote for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiation. Theresa May's Plan for a Stronger Britain will help us make a success of Brexit and deliver a stronger, fairer economy that works for everyone.

messages.title: Protecting our NHS
messages.content: Your NHS will receive more doctors, more nurses, and good care you can rely on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting the deficit, lowering taxes for working families, and getting the best Brexit deal.
Ensuring a deep and special partnership with the EU while regaining control over laws, borders, and money.
A commitment to increase NHS spending every year.
More good school places and new technical qualifications.
Help for first-time buyers and getting more homes built.
Creating higher paid, higher skilled jobs to benefit the whole country.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May's plan for Britain means she has the strength and stability to get the best deal for Britain.
issues.economy: Cutting the deficit, lowering taxes for working families, and getting the best Brexit deal.
issues.education: More good school places and new technical qualifications.
issues.health: A commitment to increase NHS spending every year.

housing.content: Help for first-time buyers and getting more homes built.

politicalExperience.achievements: Cutting crime, reducing immigration, and working to keep the country safe.

quotes.text: Every vote for Theresa May will strengthen Britain's hand in Brexit negotiations

images.caption: Theresa May interacting with various individuals and groups, emphasizing her connection with the public and her hands-on leadership.
